original_text: Uzai's son, Palal, worked near the corner and the tower on the top of the king's palace. That was beside the yard for the guards. Parosh's son, Pedaiah, 26 repaired the next part of the wall, towards the east. The temple servants who lived on Ophel Hill worked with them. They repaired the wall as far as the Water Gate and the tower which stands there.
korean_text: 우새의 아들 발랄은 성 굽이 맞은편과 왕의 윗 궁에서 내민 망대 맞은편 곧 시위청에서 가까운 부분을 중수하였고 그 다음은 바로스의 아들 브다야가 중수하였고

sentences.original_text: Uzai's son, Palal, worked near the corner
sentences.korean_translation: 우사이의 아들 발랄이 모퉁이 근처에서 일했습니다

sentences.original_text: and the tower on the top of the king's palace
That was beside the yard for the guards
Parosh's son, Pedaiah, repaired the next part of the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 바로스의 아들 브다야가 다음 성벽 부분을 수리했습니다

sentences.original_text: The temple servants who lived on Ophel Hill worked with them
sentences.korean_translation: 오벨 언덕에 살던 성전 종들도 그들과 함께 일했습니다

sentences.original_text: They repaired the wall as far as the Water Gate
and the tower which stands there
